title: MEMORY COMMIT Capsule
description: Declarative proposal to write a new memory into externalized storage, subject to review and consent.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the memory commit proposal.

hash.description: Deterministic hash of the canonicalized capsule. Computed externally.

proposed_memory_id.description: Opaque identifier proposed for the new memory.

memory_domain.description: Classification of the memory domain (e.g. relational, episodic, policy, preference).

content.description: Proposed memory content. Declarative, human-readable, and bounded in size.

source.description: Origin of the proposed memory (e.g. conversation, questionnaire, import, reflection).

rationale.description: Explanation of why this memory should be stored.

consent_reference.description: Optional capsule_id of a CONSENT ASSERTION governing this memory write.

related_request.description: Optional capsule_id of a related MEMORY REQUEST for contextual linkage.
